fr.ign.cogit.geoxygene.util.algo.geometricAlgorithms.measure.shape

Class PolygonSignatureFunction

  • Object
    • PolygonSignatureFunction

  • public class PolygonSignatureFunction
extends Object
    Geometrical function to analyse the shape of a polygon (Bel Hadj Ali, 2001): the shape is transformed into a function from [0,1] to R which represents the radial distance from the centroid to each vertex. The signature function is provided with a distance method inspired from the one in (Arkin et al 1991) dedicated to the turning function.
    Author:
    GTouya

      Constructor with the origin vertex as parameter.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double distanceArkin(IPolygon polygon2)
      Compute the polygon signature function distance between two polygons according to Arkin's method (Arkin et al, 1991) that was dedicated to turning function.
      IDirectPosition getOrigin() 
      double getValue(double s)
      If f is the polygon signature function, this method returns f(s) for s between 0 & 1.
      void print()
      Print the graph of the turning function in a dialog.

      Plot the graph of both turning functions in a dialog.
